title: Grim Dawn-RELOADED
description:
Grim Dawn (c) Crate Entertainment

02/2016 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
      1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure
                                                   Indie, RPG

Enter an apocalyptic fantasy world where humanity is on the brink of
extinction, iron is valued above gold and trust is hard earned. This ARPG
features complex character development, hundreds of unique items, crafting
and quests with choice & consequence.

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
